nodes.text: The CZ Wrist-Mounted Flame Projector was a flamethrower produced by Czerka Arms. It cost eight hundred credits when available and weighed about one kilogram. It was a thin wandlike-weapon meant to be attached to the back of a person's wrist with its fuel canister attached to the weapon by a tube. The weapon's fuel canister cost around thirty credits and was usually stored on the user's belt.
At one point, the Mandalorian bounty hunter Boba Fett used a heavily modified CZ attached to his suit of battle armor.
